3D Plot Properties Dialog Box

Requires: Full Development System

Use this dialog box to format the properties of the following 3D graphs:

  • Bar
  • Comet
  • Contour
  • Mesh
  • Pie
  • Quiver
  • Ribbon
  • Scatter
  • Stem
  • Surface
  • Waterfall

From the front panel of a VI, right-click a 3D graph and select 3D Plot Properties from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

The 3D Plot Properties dialog box might include the following pages depending on the 3D graph you select:

Graph

Light

Axis

Value Pair

Format

Cursor

Bar

Comet

Contour

Mesh

Pie

Quiver

Ribbon

Scatter

Stem

Surface

Waterfall
